item.title: .:HELP!:. Client
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

basically… the server i blocking your clients ID cause its not the correct one… so it says it is not the newest version… AKA… they have updated the client before they released it to you… just go to their site and download theirs if u can… and see if u can login using theirs…

Read full topic

item.title: .:HELP!:. Client
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

Hey… my friend made it so u need this client to connect to my server and i got a new client but when i try to connect it says “the client has been updated, please update and reload”. i found it in the client.java but i dont know wat to change heres the code

[code] fillInStream(loginPacketSize);

        if (inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 255 || inStream.readUnsignedWord() != 0x317)
		{
			System.out.println("Client was denied for not using the official client.");
			returnCode = 6;
			savefile = false;
			disconnected = true;
			out.write(returnCode);
            return;
        } [/code]

Read full topic
